An error on the server caused the socket to be closed either for security reasons or because it became unstable

ServerShuttingDown - net.jsocket.DisconnectReason
Sent to all clients while the server prepares to stop

SymmetricKey - net.jsocket.ConversationReason
Used by the library when the client generates a symmetric key used to encrypt the message payload and wants to share it securely with the server
